name: orderkuota-login
title: Get Auth Token
description: Authenticate in two steps. Select 'request_otp' to begin, then 'verify_otp' after receiving the email & copy auth token on api respon.

parameters.name: password
parameters.label: Password (for Request OTP only)
parameters.placeholder: Optional: Only fill when requesting OTP

curl:
curl -X POST https://bovalone.me/api/orderkuota-login \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"action":"request_otp","username":"your_username","password":"Optional: Only fill when requesting OTP","otp":"Optional: Only fill during verification"}'
